###The project
- This is a project by Olina Liang for the data science class. Created in 2018.
- This website analyzes the  [SkyServer](http://www.sdss.org/) DR14 data.
- The main goal of my project is to use unsupervised learning to discover clusters in the galaxies.
- Users can explore and interact with clustering methods, number of clusters, as well as images and image analysis.

###Website layout
- About tab  
        - The project: the overview of the project and layout of this website  
        - Scisever: introduction of the data being analyzed  
        - References: Weblinks of resources of my information and data   
- Clustering tab
